Vortex of Unlife

Unlife Damage:16+
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], No Effect on Mindless [mind], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This vortex affect a large area and passes straight through armor and damages the targets' souls directly. If a target is slain he will be filled by the energies from this spell and rise as a soulless warrior.
